title: BRIEF-Solstad Offshore Gets Contract With Inpex Operations Australia
text:
BRIEF-Solstad Offshore Gets Contract With Inpex Operations Australia

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 20:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Solstad Offshore Gets Contract With Inpex Operations Australia Oct 30 (Reuters) - Solstad Offshore ASA : * AHTS CONTRACTS AWARDED BY INPEX * HAS ENTERED INTO A CONTRACT WITH INPEX OPERATIONS AUSTRALIA PTY FOR PROVISION OF TWO ANCHOR HANDLERS TO SUPPORT ADDITIONAL DRILLING FOR ICHTHYS LNG DEVELOPMENT * ANCHOR HANDLERS ARE EXPECTED TO MOBILISE OUT OF BROOME, AUSTRALIA IN Q1 OF 2020 * NORMAND SCORPION AND NORMAND SIRIUS WILL BE CONTRACTED TO INPEX FOR A PERIOD OF 3 YEARS.

BRIEF-Solstad Offshore Gets Contract With Inpex Operations Australia
description: BRIEF-Solstad Offshore Gets Contract With Inpex Operations Australia
